name: Smart Move 2
description:
Smart Move 2 is a game that you complete it's levels by controlling the platforms instead of the player in this case is a ball.

Smart Move 2 is a really addictive single player puzzle/arcade game with more than 80 levels + more are coming very soon...

In this ball puzzle/arcade game you will find :

- 10 lives to start with.
Lives refilling time is 10 minutes per live.

- 4 different themes :
1.Classic theme.
2.Desert theme.
3.Volcano theme.
4.Nigh mode theme.
+more are coming very soon...

- 17 different balls with different features to choose from:
1.Classic ball.
2.Classic 2 ball.
3.Classic 3 ball.
4.Neon ball.
5. 8 ball pool.
6.Atom ball (goes inside tube without taping the tube).
7.Bucky ball (goes inside tube without taping the tube).
8.Bomb ball (explodes when losing).
9.Soccer ball.
10.Baseball.
11.Bowling ball.
12.Pokeball.
13.Wooden ball (bridge completes by itself when this is chosen).
14.Wheel (increases speed).
15.Split metal wheel (increases speed).
16.Spike ball .
17.Eyeball (wider viewpoint).
+more coming very soon...

- Easy levels you complete in first try.

- Medium levels are a little bit tricky to do in the first try .

- Hard levels take more time to complete.


PLEASE NOTE :
Smart Move 2 is a free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased with real money if you want to unlock new features such as :

- Themes
- Balls
- Premium Levels
- Lives
- Remove Advertisement
- and other...


Network connection is not required to play this game.
